Model

Details
Type: Wired
Interface: USB 2.0
Mouse Grip Style: Palm grip
Claw grip
Fingertip grip
Tracking Method: Optical
Resolution (DPI): 12000 dpi
Buttons: 5 programmable buttons+1 DPI button
Color: Black


OS / System Requirement
Operating System Supported: Windows® 10
Windows® 11


Features
Features: 1.	12,000 dpi with class-leading 1% deviation, 300-ips optical sensor and 1000 Hz polling rate.
2.	59-gram design and ergonomic shape ensure comfort
3.	Unique mechanical button-tension system warrants instant button actuation without unwanted clicks.
4.	ROG Micro Switches offer consistent click force and a 70-million-click lifespan.
5.	Swappable compatibility with mechanical switches to vary click force and extend lifespan of the mouse.
6.	ROG Paracord and 100% PTFE mouse feet.
7.	DPI On-The-Scroll enables effortless on-the-fly in-game adjustments.
